item.name: Join open game (that is waiting for a guest) (knowing the ID)
Admin DEBUG - get all games info (for debug purposes, only admin can do)
QuitGame on invalid game state (like SHIP_SETUP)
Get info of the game user is playing at
1 - A user creates a game (he cant be in another ongoing game)
2 - A user joins a game, which the ID he will know by getting the list of open games
The host asks for an update
3 - Host sends his board  setup and by default is set has ready
4 - Guest sends his board setup, but says he is not ready
The host asks for an update Copy
5 - Host decided to add one more ship but he cant because he said by default that he was ready
6 - Guest decides to add one more ship
The host asks for an update Copy 2
The guest asks for an update Copy 3
The host asks for an update given the id
